name: Grilled Ham and Cheese Waffle Sandwiches
author: Farmland
summary: Sliced ham, Swiss cheese, and arugula sandwiched between cheesy toasted waffles are grilled until melty make a delicious twist on a classic sandwich.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package Farmland® Deli-Style Sliced Ham
½ cup arugula or spinach leaves
directions: In a medium bowl stir together the flour, sugar, basil, baking powder, and salt
Add egg, milk, shredded cheese, and oil
Add batter to a preheated, lightly greased waffle iron and bake according to manufacturer's directions
When done, use a fork to lift waffle off waffle iron
For each sandwich, spread waffles with mustard
Layer ham, sliced cheese, and arugula on half of the waffles
Top with remaining waffles, spread side down
Heat a griddle or 12-inch skillet over medium heat
Cook for 4 minutes or until cheese is melted, turning once
